Elizabeth:WildCardPower.NAME: Arcana Swapped
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer use Wild Card this turn.

Elizabeth:FoolPower.NAME: Fool
DESCRIPTIONS: Arcana cards have their Bonus enabled.
The Fool Arcana does not mean that it can be taken lightly. The Fool is number zero. It is the void from which all other things begin.

Elizabeth:EmperorPower.NAME: Emperor

Elizabeth:DownedPower.NAME: Downed
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy takes 25% more damage and cannot act this turn. Become Undowned at the start of next turn.
